definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: Oxana Yablonskaya is a Yamaha Artist.
sentences.chinese: 雅布隆斯卡婭還是雅馬哈藝術家。

sentences.english: Yamaha has never claimed to have its own factory in China.
sentences.chinese: 雅馬哈從未聲稱擁有在中國的工廠。

sentences.english: My job title is Managing Director of Yamaha Motor Racing Srl.
sentences.chinese: 我的頭銜是雅馬哈摩托競速管理董事。

sentences.english: I found that there was a Yamaha shop on the south side of town, past the airstrip .
sentences.chinese: 我發現，有雅馬哈店南側鎮，過去的簡易機場。

sentences.english: Now that would throw up a curve ball that would keep a smile on the faces of the Yamaha guys wouldn't it?
sentences.chinese: 現在好好刁難一下會讓雅馬哈的人面露笑意吧？

sentences.english: “I think that here in Yamaha my work is finished, ” said Rossi.
sentences.chinese: “在雅馬哈的工作可以結束了，”羅西說。

sentences.english: I want to retrieve some used SMT machine like Yamaha and so on.
sentences.chinese: 想找回一點用貼片機一樣，雅馬哈等。

sentences.english: Yamaha's factory in China is new, with a reletively unseasoned staff.
sentences.chinese: 雅馬哈的工廠在中國是新的，工作人員業務能力不精。

definition: Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
range of values/category defined by a range of values (tier, bracket, stratum etc)
